extendedInfo.description: Flash Light for your device! Incredibly simple and yet very useful flashlight application. Will use your device's camera LED as a torch.Uses your phone's camera led (flash) to emit bright light. Note that some devices don't have a camera flash.-Turn your phone into an LED flashlight!-Turn your phone into a flashlight!

reviews.title: Lightning quick
reviews.comment: It is instant on my S4. Best one I\'ve tried. I just wish that I could have a way to put this in the bottom tray of my lock screen.
reviews.author: Robert Davis

reviews.comment: Took ages to find a light widget like this. It\'s beautiful and doesn\'t open up a window. Top app, thank you so much!
reviews.author: Alice Cornelius

reviews.title: Robustt..
reviews.comment: Very light app with same functionality as other apps (even better than some). But the camera wont work while it is on. Also the light won\'t turn off when it is switched off. It stays switched on until the camera is started.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Only one iv found that doesnt interfere with camera - sony arc s
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Works good on samsung galaxy s2. Only anoying thing is that when the screen light goes off, the torch goes off as well, so u have to turn it off then on again for it to start working again
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: This widget is 34kb so hardly uses any space. Simple on/off use. Contrary to reviews, it doesn\'t affect the camera and it stays on after screen times out. Xperia
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Turn on/off fast
reviews.comment: Fast & easy turn on/off. Exactly what I need when light out. Brilliant!!!!
reviews.author: Linh Chi Tran

reviews.title: X10 mini
reviews.comment: Simple, quick & creatif :D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome widget!
reviews.comment: Does just what it needs to, and nothing more. Beautifully crafted 1x1 widget that is mostly transparent, so it doesn\'t block your background. Press for on, and the bulb image lights up (as does your camera LED, and quickly). Press it again, and they turn off.  No stupid full-screen imitation flashlight image, no fuss.  A must-have!!!
reviews.author: Gordon Lloyd Goldberg

reviews.title: Just what I wanted
reviews.comment: Simple widget only camera led toggle works great
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on SIII mini
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t do a blessed thing.
reviews.author: Scott Varga

reviews.title: Nice widget that doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Not sure why it doesnt do anything on  my samsung s3 mini
reviews.author: Sa Shee

reviews.title: Worked great
reviews.comment: It worked flawlessly for a while, but then the light started to turn itself off. Had to uninstall when the light wouldn\'t stay on for more than 15 secs or so. It was an erratic time frame
reviews.author: Ray McDivitt

reviews.title: It\'s
reviews.comment: Not working on samsung fascinate (galaxy s 1) running gingerbread 2.3.5 And they don\'t reply to any of your emails
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The best
reviews.comment: The most simple yet fastest App. No window opening. Thanks.
reviews.author: Sumudu Weragoda

reviews.title: Simple
reviews.comment: Its a simple little switch on your screen!! Just exactly what I was looking for.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not for galaxy ace
reviews.comment: Ppease make it compatible with all phone my phone has led flash light but this widget doesnt work
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: 34kB and does what it says on the tin.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good widget
reviews.comment: Works on galaxy s2 a treat
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rather useless.
reviews.comment: When the screen timeouts, the flash light is turned off. Useless.
reviews.author: A Google User
